UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Activity, structure, and diversity of Type II proline-rich antimicrobial peptides from insects
Literature.Author: Huang W, Baliga C, Aleksandrova EV, Atkinson G, Polikanov YS, Vázquez-Laslop N, Mankin AS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=0.5µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae AR-0112(MIC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae AR-0112(MIC=32µM)
